TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: Version incremented from 0.8 (Provenance) to 1.1 (Provenance) in January 2023 following internal review and updates, and to match the versioning on the PRSB website.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: This is a record of an event performed by someone or something. An event can happen at one time and be recorded at another time.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The person, professional or device recording the information in the record.

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The relationship the personal contact has to the person, e.g. father, grandmother, family friend etc. Includes additional roles the person performs on behalf of the other (e.g. carer, next of kin, emergency contact, dependent, etc.).

TaggedValue.name: description
TaggedValue.value: The coded value for relationship.

TaggedValue.name: valueSets
TaggedValue.value: Nationally or internationally maintained code system(s) (see implementation guidance).
